name: Crashtastrophy
description:
My game takes place in outer space where you play as an alien spaceship bent on destroying the universe. Unfortunately for you, your ship only has the ability to shoot energy orbs that bounce planets away from you. You need to make them hit into each other as much as possible in 20 seconds before you run out of oxygen on board and have to return home.

It was created for the 20 second game jam!
